description: The parc offers many trails and here is one of them...
directions: Take exit 74 off Highway 10 for Rte Pierre-Laporte toward Granby/Bromont/Cowansville 0.4 km Turn left at Route Pierre-Laporte 9.5 km.Continue on Boulevard Pierre-Laporte/RTE-241 Continue to follow RTE-241 5.4 kmTurn left at Rue Principale/RTE-241 1.7 kmTurn left at Boulevard Jean-Jacques-Bertrand/RTE-104/RTE-139 Continue to follow RTE-104/RTE-139 2.6 kmTurn right at Chemin de West-Brome/RTE-139/West-Brome Rd Continue to follow RTE-139 12.7 kmTurn left at Maple St/Rue Maple 1.0 kmContinue on Chemin Maple 3.1 kmSlight left to stay on Chemin Maple 0.4 km Turn right to stay on Chemin Maple 0.4 km Turn right at Chemin Réal 1.8 km
title: Dos d'orignal à Sutton
